author: Korrespondent.net
title: Ground News - Russians are increasingly refusing to fight
text:
Summary by Korrespondent.net From Luhansk region, 43 servicemen from the 150th motorized infantry division of the Russian armed forces who refused to participate in hostilities were sent to the territory of the Russian Federation under police escort. Share menu More

Korrespondent.net Russians are increasingly refusing to fight From Luhansk region, 43 servicemen from the 150th motorized infantry division of the Russian armed forces who refused to participate in hostilities were sent to the territory of the Russian Federation under police escort.
